page.title: 17Redditch Industry. (Part 2)
page.content: They are{specialists}in the fields of pneumatics, hydraulics, cryogenic cooling systems and electronic engineering. Most of the products are made from{stainless steel}or{ {aluminium.}Hymatic Engineering is a member of the{Flight Refuelling Group, a multinational company. The office staff work{37 hours}per week, and the factory workers{39 hours.}The factory is pleasant to work in with good facilities. An{apprentice}I spoke to said he enjoyed working there. On her visit to Redditch in July 1983, H.R.H. Queen Elizabeth II visited{Hydrovane,} an associated company, to see the{ {modern factory}and its techniques. Redditch has a long{industrial history and the townspeople hope that the future will be prosperous. At present, there is 17% unemployment in the area.
